name: py-datacube
description: An analysis environment for satellite and other earth observation data.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

Python interface to PROJ (cartographic projections and coordinate
transformations library).

dependencies.description: Manipulation and analysis of geometric objects in the Cartesian plane.

dependencies.name: py-cachetools
dependencies.description:
This module provides various memoizing collections and decorators,
including variants of the Python 3 Standard Library @lru_cache function
decorator.

dependencies.name: py-click
dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-cloudpickle
dependencies.description: Extended pickling support for Python objects.

dependencies.name: py-dask
dependencies.description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytics.

dependencies.name: py-distributed
dependencies.description: Distributed scheduler for Dask

dependencies.name: py-jsonschema
dependencies.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.

dependencies.name: py-netcdf4
dependencies.description: Python interface to the netCDF Library.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-psycopg2
dependencies.description: Python interface to PostgreSQL databases

dependencies.name: py-lark-parser
dependencies.description: Lark is a modern general-purpose parsing library for Python.

dependencies.name: py-python-dateutil
dependencies.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-rasterio
dependencies.description:
Rasterio reads and writes geospatial raster data. Geographic information
systems use GeoTIFF and other formats to organize and store gridded, or
raster, datasets. Rasterio reads and writes these formats and provides a
Python API based on N-D arrays.

dependencies.name: py-sqlalchemy
dependencies.description: The Python SQL Toolkit and Object Relational Mapper

dependencies.name: py-toolz
dependencies.description: A set of utility functions for iterators, functions, and dictionaries

dependencies.name: py-xarray
dependencies.description: N-D labeled arrays and datasets in Python

dependent_to.name: py-geocube
dependent_to.description: Tool to convert geopandas vector data into rasterized xarray data.
